creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: square basket with short feet; flares towards top; round mouth; crisscrossing open weave; copper lined bamboo cylinder
marks: Signature incised on bottom: [ 竹房斎造之]
medium: Bamboo (hōbichiku or susudake), bamboo (madake?), rattan, lacquer
title: Footed Flower Basket
